news_header: JPMorgan Chase & Co was held by 13 hedge funds in the latest 13F filings, indicating a potential bullish sentiment.
news_original_title: See Which Of The Latest 13F Filers Holds JPMorgan Chase
news_text: Recent 13F filings reveal that JPMorgan Chase & Co (Symbol: JPM) was held by 13 hedge funds for the reporting period ending 12/31/2024. While these filings only disclose long positions, they can provide insights into hedge fund sentiment. Notably, 8 funds increased their JPM positions, while 2 decreased theirs, and 1 initiated a new position. Overall, hedge funds increased their aggregate holdings of JPM by approximately 2.45%, from 508,894,120 to 521,369,221 shares. This trend suggests a growing interest in JPMorgan Chase & Co among hedge funds.
